Nature of the document:-
You are the youngest son of 1. and 2. and brother of 2. and 3. and 4. and 5. and 6. and 7. and 8. and 9. and 10. and 11. and 12. and 13. and 14. and 15. and 16. and 17. and 18. and 19. and 20. and 21. and 22. and 23. and 24. and 25. and 26. and 27. and 28. and 29 The land as per the Schedule below, including the R.C.C. Building, which is being enjoyed, is given to you free of charge and the said property is given to you on this day itself.
Therefore, from now on, you are the full rightful owner of the said property and you, your children and grandchildren, shall enjoy it happily and freely with all the full rights of inheritance, donation, exchange and sale, on payment of the dues of the Government.
Whatever disputes arise in this regard, we, our tenants and our heirs, at our own expense, will remove all such disputes and execute these deeds to you, your tenants and your heirs without delay.
We, the Scheduled Property I hereby certify that the property is undisputed and free from any mortgage, guarantee, etc., encroachment, survey number, permit, boundaries, etc., and that the same is correct and in good faith. I hereby issue this deed to you for the registration of your name in the records of the Municipality. It is not an assigned land as per A.P.(P.O.T.) Act No: 9/77. 1. Ko 2. K. sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 582 of 2026, dated 24/Jan/2026, executed by 1. Kommureddy Somaraju 2. Kommireddy Lakshmi in favour of Kommireddy Nagaraju [Where as Donee is the Son of 1st Donor and Donee is the Brother of 2nd Donor], towards the property admeasuring an extent of 80 Sq. Yds., located Near by Door No. 7-1-64/2, Assessment No. 1142005443, comprised in survey number 558-2, situated in Jangareddigudem Village, Town, Municipality and Mandal, within the District of Eluru, registered at sub-registrar office J.R.Gudem is bounded as follows: North by: House of Balusuri Lakshmi South by: House of Shaik Hussen Bi East by: Site of Kommireddy Lakshmi West by: Municipality Road
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
